        Mode the learner is operating in.

      • learningRate

        double learningRate
        Learning rate of the learner.

      • discountFactor

        double discountFactor
        Discount factor of the learner. A higher discount factor places more value on short-term rewards.

      • query

        abstract double[] query(RLAgent.State state)
        Return the correct action for the given state.
        Parameters:
        state - the current state.
        Returns:
        array of raw action values.

      • updateSupervisedLearner

        abstract void updateSupervisedLearner(RLAgent.State state,
                           RLAgent.Action action,
                           RLAgent.State newState,
                           double reward)
        Update the supervised learner with a new data point.
        Parameters:
        state - the state the agent was in.
        action - the action preformed.
        newState - the resultant state.
        reward - the reward received.
